messages.subject: Surf's Up
messages.msgSnippet: Greeting s all, can anyone identify this style of harmon to any particular school/group ?. I have it as probably Mino, gunome/midare based on notare ( cant see
messages.messageBody:
Greeting's all, can anyone identify this style of harmon to any particular school/group ?. I have it as probably Mino, gunome/midare based on notare ( cant see the hada or any exra activity ) I have searched through my books and have a rough visual ( sketch ) reference in the NTHK novice course describing it as Notareba with Ko gunome. in Mino-To by Cox, the Ujifusa Ha seems a possible candidate. Does anyone have any thought's on this ?.

http://www.whiz.com.au/richard/notare-midare-gunome.jpg

It kind of looks like it's a little choppy on the crests of the waves,

Surf's up

Rich T

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
